bigFunCards.name: IRS Audit
bigFunCards.description: If you have over $1000 pay $200. If you have under $1000 collect $100

bigFunCards.name: Property Tax!
bigFunCards.description: Pay $25 for each City Block owned, $100 for each Key to the City.

bigFunCards.name: Play The Lottery
bigFunCards.description: Place any amount up to $50 in the center of the board for tickets. Choose a number between 2 and 12. If you roll your chosen number, collect 10 times the amount you placed in the center

bigFunCards.name: Detour!
bigFunCards.description: Get out of Traffic Jam FREE
